SoftwareType.Name: Emulator
SoftwareType.Description: A piece of software that emulates, or replicates, the processes of old operating systems allowing users to replay their favorite nostalgic games.

Feature.Name: Basic Hardware Emulation
Feature.Description: The first thing to tackle is how the software pretends to have hardware that replicates old systems.

Feature.Name: Graphical Emulation
Feature.Description: By replicating old graphical techniques, the emulator can process and display old games.

Feature.Name: Current Hardware Compatability
Feature.Description: Replicating is easy. Getting it to work on current hardware configuations is hard, but creates a stable environment.

Feature.Name: Open Source Classic Games
Feature.Description: User's appreciate older games being made availible to tinker with and play.

Feature.Name: Mobile Phone Version
Feature.Description: Port the emulator to mobile phones so people can enjoy classic games on the go.
